*: The average size of a heart is the size of a fist in an adult.
Whales have the largest heart of any mammal.
A woman’s heat beats slightly faster than a man’s heart.
Laughing is good for your heart. It reduces stress and gives a boost to your immune system.
Research has found that green vegetables contain Vitamin K, which helps protect your arteries.
Studies show that eating whole grains decreases risk of heart diseases.
Heart is situated in the middle of your chest between your two lungs.
To keep your heart healthy you need to get at least 30 minutes of exercise.
Eating Dark chocolate is good for heart.
